title: Yellow
lyrics:
[intro - two bars of each chord] (G) (D) (C) (G)
 
(G) Look at the stars
Look how they shine for (D) you
And everything you (C) do
Yeah they were all yellow
 
(G) I came along
I wrote a song for (D) you
And all the things you (C) do
And it was called yellow (G)
 
So then I took my (D) turn
Oh what a thing to have (C) done
And it was all yellow (G-Gsus4-G)
 
(C) Your ski(Em)in
Oh yeah your (D)skin and bones
(C) Turn in(Em)to something (D)beautiful
(C) D’you know (Em) you know I (D)love you so (C)
(C) You know I love you so
 
(G) (D) (C) (G)
 
(G) I swam across
I jumped across for (D) you
Oh all the things you (C) do
Cause you were all yellow
 
(G) I drew a line
I drew a line for (D) you
Oh what a thing to (C) do
And it was all yellow (G-Gsus4-G)
 
(C) Your ski(Em)in
Oh yeah your (D)skin and bones
(C) Turn in(Em)to something (D)beautiful
(C) D’you know (Em) for you I (D)bleed myself (C)dry
(C) For you I bleed myself dry
 
(G) (D) (C) (G)
 
It’s (G)true
Look how they shine for (D)you
Look how they shine for (C)you
Look how they shine for (G)
Look how they shine for (D)you
Look how they shine for (C)you
Look how they shine
(G) Look at the stars
Look how they shine for (D) you
And all the things that you (C) do [end]
